originalText.text:
New York Foundation for Senior Citizens (NYFSC) is dedicated to helping New York’s
seniors enjoy healthier, safer, more productive and dignified lives in their homes and
communities and to help them avoid the need for premature institutionalization.
Established in 1968, NYFSC is the only non-profit, non-sectarian organization serving
New York’s seniors in all five boroughs.

New York Foundation for Senior Citizens (NYFSC) is dedicated to helping New York’s
seniors enjoy healthier, safer, more productive and dignified lives in their homes and
communities and to help them avoid the need for premature institutionalization.
Established in 1968, NYFSC is the only non-profit, non-sectarian organization serving
New York’s seniors in all five boroughs.

originalText.text: NECESITAN ENTRENAR MEJOR A SUS TRABAJADORAS, DESDE LAS TELEFONISTAS HASTA LAS CUIDADORAS DE ADULTOS MAYORES. NO HACEN NADA BIEN EL TRABAJO POR EL CUAL SE LES PAGA. LAS TELEFONISTAS SON IRRESPTUOSAS AL CONTESTAR LLAMADAS DE PERSONAS. NO TIENEN ETIQUETA AL CLIENTE NI SABEN DE RELACIONES INTERPERSONALES. SIEMPRE QUE HE LLAMADO PIDIENDO SUPERVISOR NO ME COMUNICAN. LAS CUIDADORAS QUE HAN ENVIADO A TRABAJAR SON INEPTAS Y DEMUESTRAN SU INCAPACIDAD PARA UN TRABAJO QUE SUPUESTAMENTE SE LES ENTRENA. SU TRABAJO ES MEDIOCRE Y DEPRORABLE PARA DECIR LO MENOS. UNA PERSONA QUE TOMA ENTRENAMIENTO PARA TRABAJAR CON PERSONAS MAYORES Y QUE NO SEPA NI SIQUIERA PONER UN PAÑAL Ó HACER UNA SIMPLE PAPILLA, ES ALGO PENOSO Y VERGONZOSO EN VERDAD. Y ENCIMA SE GANAN UN CHEQUE Y VIENEN CON ACTITUD Y FALTA DE RESPETO A LOS ANCIANOS Y SUS FAMILIARES. ESO NO ES CORRECTO, ES REPROBABLE. DEBERIAN MANDAR PERSONAS CON CAPACITACIÓN Y PROFESIONALISMO A LOS HOGARES DE PERSONAS MAYORES QUE APENAS SE PUEDEN VALER POR SI MISMAS Ó AL MENOS PONERLE SUPERVISIÓN A SUS EMPLEADAS. MAL SERVICIO. ES MEDIOCRE.

text.text: THEY NEED TO TRAIN THEIR WORKERS BETTER, FROM THE PHONE OPERATORS TO THE CAREGIVERS OF ELDERLY ADULTS. THEY DO NOT DO THE JOB FOR WHICH THEY ARE PAID AT ALL WELL. TELLER ANS ARE DISRESPECTFUL WHEN ANSWERING PEOPLE'S CALLS. THEY DO NOT HAVE CUSTOMER ETIQUETTE OR KNOW ABOUT INTERPERSONAL RELATIONSHIPS. EVERY TIME I HAVE CALLED ASKING FOR A SUPERVISOR THEY DO NOT CONTACT ME. THE CAREGIVERS WHO HAVE BEEN SENT TO WORK ARE INEPT AND DEMONSTRATE THEIR INCAPACITY FOR A JOB FOR WHICH THEY ARE SUPPOSEDLY TRAINED. THEIR WORK IS MEDIOCRE AND DEPRORABLE TO SAY THE LEAST. A PERSON WHO TAKES TRAINING TO WORK WITH OLDER PEOPLE AND WHO DOES NOT EVEN KNOW HOW TO PUT ON A DIAPER OR MAKE A SIMPLE PURPLE, IS TRULY SOMETHING PAINFUL AND SHAMEFUL. AND ON TOP OF THEM THEY EARN A CHECK AND THEY COME WITH ATTITUDE AND LACK OF RESPECT TO THE ELDERLY AND THEIR RELATIVES. THAT IS NOT CORRECT, IT IS REPROBABLE. THEY SHOULD SEND PEOPLE WITH TRAINING AND PROFESSIONALISM TO THE HOMES OF ELDERLY PEOPLE WHO CAN BARELY TAKE CARE OF THEMSELVES OR AT LEAST GIVE SUPERVISION TO THEIR EMPLOYEES. BAD SERVICE. IT'S MEDIOCRE.
